name: The Heirs
description: The series follows a group of wealthy, privileged high school students as they are about to take over their families' business empires, overcoming difficulties and growing every step of the way.

name: Hotel Del Luna
description: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

name: Prison Playbook
description: Je-Hyeok (Park Hae-Soo) is the best relief pitcher in Korea. He will go to the U.S. and sign a contract with a major league team. One night, he hears his sister screaming and sees a man running out of her apartment. Je-Hyeok and the man get into a physical struggle with Je-Hyeok striking the man with a rock. Later, Je-Hyeok receives a 1 year prison sentence for using excessive force. Devastated, Je-Hyeok must adapt to life in prison.

name: Kill Heel
description: A story of the endless desires and struggles of 3 women at UNI Home Shopping.

name: what's wrong with secretary kim
description: Directed by Park Joon Hwa, “What’s Wrong With Secretary Kim” is a much-loved 2018 kdrama based on the novel by Jung Kyung Yoon and following webcomic by Kim Young Mi. With much of the series’ inspiration coming from the original material, a star-studded cast ensures What's Wrong with Secretary Kim? is a must-watch for fans of kdramas. With endless romantic and comedic moments to enjoy, you’ll find yourself finishing the series in no time at all.

description: Made half-human and half-spirit by accident, a young man is employed by grim reapers to carry out special missions..

name: A Happy women
description: As the titular happy woman Lee Ji-yeon (Yoon Jung-hee) is an accessory designer with a cheerful, go-getting personality despite often being looked down upon because of her humble educational and family background. She ends up in a love triangle with her wealthy husband (Jung Gyu-woon) and a lonely detective (Kim Suk-hoon), as the drama explores what happiness means for a woman in terms of family, work, and love.

name: Goblin The Lonely And Great God
description: Kim Shin, an immortal goblin, goes to find a human bride to remove an invisible sword from his chest and end his life. One day, school student Ji Eun-Tak confesses to him that she is the chosen one.

name: Crash Landing On You
description: The stars of 'Crash Landing On You' make wedding plans. Actors Hyun Bin and Son Ye-jin who co-starred in the romantic 2019 Korean drama Crash Landing On You have announced their intention to wed. The drama focused on the character Se-ri, a South Korean heiress, played by Son, who accidentally lands in North Korea.

name: extraordinary attorney woo
description: She might be different from you and me but when it comes to delivering justice, you can bet that no case is too big or difficult for this newbie attorney to handle. Join her as she tackles challenges in the courtroom and beyond with the help of her friends and colleagues

name: Dream High
description: Six dedicated students at Kirin Art High School work to achieve their dreams of becoming stars in the Korean music industry.

name: Vincenzo
description: During a visit to his motherland, a Korean-Italian mafia lawyer gives a conglomerate a taste of its own medicine with a side of justice.

name: The Golden Spoon
description: Based on Naver hit webtoon of the same name by HD3 which was published in 2016, the series depicts a life adventure of a child who became an acquired gold spoon

name: Goblin
description: Kim Shin, an immortal goblin, goes to find a human bride to remove an invisible sword from his chest and end his life. One day, school student Ji Eun-Tak confesses to him that she is the chosen one.

name: All of us are dead
description: Trapped students must escape their high school which has become ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak.

name: Buisness Proposal
description: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up on a blind date to scare away her friend's prospective suitor. However, plans go awry when he turns out to be Ha-ri's CEO and he makes a proposal.

name: Twenty-Five Twenty-One
description: “Twenty Five Twenty One” is a heartfelt South Korean drama starring Nam Joo-Hyuk as Baek Yi-Jin, a once wealthy son who lost it all, and Kim Tae-Ri as Na Hee-Do, a young aspiring fencer.

name: Big Mouth
description: The series tells the story of an underperforming lawyer who gets caught up in a murder case. In order to survive and protect his family, he digs into a huge conspiracy among the privileged upper classes

name: Thirty-Nine (2022)
description: This slice-of-life drama centers on a trio of best friends who meet in their second year of high school. As they grow into their late 30s together, they must weather through life’s challenges before reaching 40.
